reviewText: Had this in my wish list to buy for our grandson...unfortunately the price has doubled over the last week.  Guess it's true...you snooze, you lose!  :(

I wanted to buy another set but I guess was too late to order for the price I purchased it.  I bought it for my 3 year old grandson and wanted to buy one for myself but the price went up too too high for my pocket.  I wish I could get the same deal again someday.
I'm so glad I can finally have all the collection of "The Land Before Time" Series with a good price. Thank You Amazon!!!

I've only seen 4 or 5 of these movies, but I liked each one when I was a kid. I'm sure the whole series is great. There are lot's of fun, catchy songs and good messages in the movie. The dinosaur children come across problems that dinosaurs would have, like: sharp teeth (carnivores), asteroids, earthquakes, volcanoes, ect... These movies are full of adventure and fun for kids.
It arrived at my door completely undamaged and I have happy kids!!
Great movies for the kids
Love this set and so do my kids!

Wonderful collection conveniently on DVD altogether. I saw this on sale and couldn't resist passing it up. I grew up on these movies as a child and still love them as an adult. Watching them is a heartfelt journey down memory lane.
Family loved the movies .

I grew up watching these as a kid, and my own kids fell in love with the few movies that were available on Netflix.  I'm so glad I snagged this for them during a lightning deal!  The quality of the later movies are so much better than the first, and there are more than a few in this boxset I had never even seen before.  We love them all!
I grew up watching these movies and owned all of them on VHS. But, the box was damaged.
My nephew loves these and it saves us from having to let him use our TV.

I loved this so much that I bought it twice. I originally bought this for my nephew who is big into dinosaurs. After purchasing it, my husband  talked about how much he loved the movies as a child so I bought another one for him. I didn't know there were 14 movies, I had only seen the ones on Netflix. This is a great buy for kids and kids at heart.
I watched these when I was young and got them so my son can enjoy them too! Lots of good lessons in the story line as well! He loves them and asks to watch the dinosaurs. Great purchase!

I just can't figure out how they survived the ice age...at this point I'm just waiting for them to  grow into the characters from "We're Back".

Good price for 14 movies and is great packaging for storage limits.

I grew up with these movies. Despite the steady decline in quality over the years they retain their innocence and enjoyment. The songs can be a bit addicting. If you let your younger kids watch them prepare yourself for never getting them out for the next few months.

The lessons are typical and timeless. Given novelty being presented by little talking dinosaurs. Mind you it's not always fun and games. Keep in mind the occasional death marks these movies (especially the first one, directed by Spielberg himself, which may bring tears to even hardened adults). The movies take a very "hands on" view of the "moral of the story". They don't really outright tell you "LEARN THIS". Sometimes it's subtle and dealt with entirely in the plotline.

The Land Before Time has always been one of my most cherished animated movies from my childhood years, so it was a very happy day when I was able to buy the entire Land Before Time series from Amazon. I was able to reacquaint myself with my favorite characters, relearn all the songs and enjoy the adventures the five dinosaur friends have, over and over again. This is one DVD movie collection I will never regret buying. Money well spent.
Haven't watched them all yet, but what a great buy!!!

I don't have kids/grandkids -- these were for ME!  I had seen one on TV and decided with this price, I couldn't go wrong, and I didn't!

No errors were noted in any of the movies and the ability to fast forward or skip the previews was nice.

I noted one review complaining that the disks were made in Mexico.  I don't see the prolem -- most disks are now.  The movies themselves were done in England so what's the big deal?

Just enjoy Littlefoot, Cera, Spike, Ducky, and Petrie.  It's just a nice "feel-good" set of short movies.

My older children had The Land Before Time on VHS back in the mid-1990's and I was very excited to find the entire set on Amazon at an amazing price.  I sat down with my youngest child tonight to introduce her to the Land Before Time movie and was very disappointed at the quality of this DVD.  The video was a dark grainy mess.  I asked my husband (who is an IT guy and knows about this kind of stuff) to take a look at our DVD player to see if it was a setting issue or if it was the DVD itself.  He took one look at it and asked me where I had gotten the DVD from because he said it looked like someone had illegally copied a VHS tape onto a DVD (like you might find at a flea market)and was trying to sell it as the real deal.  Needless to say this set will be going back.  Yes, $49.99 was a great deal for all 13 movies if you don't mind a horrible quality output on the DVD.  Guess you get what you pay for. :(

We already watched almost half of the movies and I can't stop singing the songs and laughing or crying when it gets to emotional and I'm a 17 year old girl!

Seriously it was an AWESOME offer and it was worth every dolar.

The only complaint I have is that two of the dvd's (The Land Before Time VII: The Stone of Cold Fire, The Land Before Time VIII: The Big Freeze) came only in english and french and I'm a native Spanish speaker per say and without subtitles so my dad and mom (who don't understand english unlike me) sadly can't see those two.

But if you are a native english speaker and you want to buy it for your kids or just because you love the movies like me then, go ahead because you will be buying an incredible amount of entretainment, fun times, lovely songs and wonderful teachings about life, friendship, hope, love and the fact that no matter how different we seem to be from others in the end we are always the same.

Quick Points:
- Arrived VERY quickly! I chose the slowest free shipping option and it still arrived in 2 days!
- Perfect condition! The discs and dividers in the case are all in order and working!
- It really is all of them! All of the spin-offs as well as the original Don Bluth movie AND the new 2016 one with Reba!
- Worth the price. Even when it isn't on sale, this costs way less to buy all of these movies than each of them separately or in 3 or 4 packs!
- Sweet memories! I loved these movies as a kid and now I can share them with my niece and nephews!
- Enjoyable for all! Adults and kids alike can enjoy these movies! It also gives us something in common to bond over.
- It's not Minions. These movies take difficult but interesting adult concepts like death, separation, and grey morality then put it into a fun sing-a-long experience children can understand and enjoy.

Full Review:
I used to watch the Land Before Time movies all the time as a child. I had almost all of them on VHS tape and I would play them so much. Even my elder brother and mother remember and enjoy watching them (my mom loves the Lone Dinosaur). My brother ended up buying me the two-DVD set with movies 6 through 9 a little while back and I put it on for my nephews once. They LOVED it!

Every time they come over, they wanted to watch it but just those 4 movies were getting a bit stale to watch. A few weeks ago, I tried to put in my VHS tape of Journey Through The Mists (#4) and the old VHS player just couldn't hack it anymore---there were lines and bars all over the screen, and color distortions. It was totally unwatchable. One of my nephews watch what little of the tape managed to work with me and saw that movie's villains, which included the belly-dragger Dil. Every time he came over afterwards, he would plead to watch the dinosaur movie with the "crocodile" in it.

Finally, I decided I would buy the Land of the Mists online just so I could let him watch the "crocodile" he wanted to see so badly. I ended up finding this collection, which I couldn't find anywhere else. It had ALL of the movies for approximately half of what it would cost to buy all the different sets to piece together a collection? I was sold! I ordered it on June 25th, and it arrived here on the 27th! I didn't even pay for two day shipping, I bought the slowest, free delivery option since it will be a little while before my nephews come over. That's fantastic service right there!

I'm going to have a great time showing each of these movies one-by-one to my niece and nephews. It's well worth the price to have a boxset of 14 movies (over 17 hours worth of film according to the box), but its absolutely priceless to be able to create the memories and traditions that were taught to me as a kid and I can now pass on to my brother's children.
Purchased two sets for grand son and great grand daughter
